statements: SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT contact_number, email FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT full_name, email, donation_date FROM donors WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT donor_id, full_name, contact_number, email, donation_amount, donation_date, communication_preference FROM donors WHERE donation_amount < 500;
SELECT full_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, email FROM donors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE communication_preference = 'Email' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT donor_id, full_name, email, donation_amount FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount ASC, full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount < 500;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donor_phone, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.donation_amount, donations.donation_date FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donors.donor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT donors.donor_name, SUM(donations.donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id GROUP BY donors.donor_name;
SELECT donors.donor_name, donations.donation_date FROM donors LEFT JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donations.donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contact_details ORDER BY first_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE donor_id = 3;
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM donation_history ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, amount FROM donation_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM contact_details WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT donation_id, donation_date, amount FROM donation_history WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT cd.first_name, dh.amount, cp.email_notifications FROM contact_details cd INNER JOIN donation_history dh ON cd.donor_id = dh.donor_id INNER JOIN communication_preferences cp ON cd.donor_id = cp.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donation_history ORDER BY donation_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT contact_name, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE donor_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM donation_history ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_type FROM donors WHERE donor_type = 'Individual';
SELECT contact_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT donor_name, donor_address FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE donor_id = 123;
SELECT donor_name, donor_type, donor_address FROM donors WHERE donor_type = 'Individual';
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation_history WHERE donor_id = 456 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email_opt_in, phone_opt_in, mail_opt_in FROM communication_preferences JOIN donors ON communication_preferences.donor_id = donors.donor_id;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM contact_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT contact_id, email FROM contact_details WHERE contact_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM donation_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT note_id, note_text FROM donor_notes WHERE contact_id = 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM contact_details WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donation_history ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT cd.first_name, cd.last_name, dh.amount, dh.donation_date FROM contact_details cd INNER JOIN donation_history dh ON cd.contact_id = dh.contact_id WHERE dh.amount > 1000;

SELECT da.address_line, da.city, da.state, da.zip_code, cd.first_name, cd.last_name FROM donor_addresses da INNER JOIN contact_details cd ON da.contact_id = cd.contact_id WHERE da.state = 'California';

SELECT cn.note_text, cn.note_date, cd.first_name, cd.last_name FROM donor_notes cn INNER JOIN contact_details cd ON cn.contact_id = cd.contact_id WHERE cn.note_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cn.note_date DESC;
